item.title: Setting up a reverse proxy, traefik
item.description: So I run a few services at home, primarily for testing and development only. I simply do not have the infrastructure or network to do so for anything I deem important. That said, being able to test some things quickly on a system where I have to care little about introducing breaking changes is very handy (not that I often do, just when it happens I don’t do it on production :p ).
